description: Rate elements of the text with a character-level LSTM language model in Keras

model_file.description: path of h5py weight/config file for model trained with keraslm

textequiv_level.description: PAGE XML hierarchy level to evaluate TextEquiv sequences on

alternative_decoding.description: whether to process all TextEquiv alternatives, finding the best path via beam search, and delete each non-best alternative

beam_width.description: maximum number of best partial paths to consider during search with alternative_decoding

lm_weight.description: share of the LM scores over the input confidences
